fields.name: displayError
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong...


Error message:

{!CustomError}

screens.name: Screen_2_Ask_User_to_Confirm_Date
screens.label: Screen 2 - Ask User to Confirm Date

fields.name: displayHeaderCheckEvent
fields.fieldText:
Confirm Event


We've found this Event.

Please confirm that the dates are correct:


Start:

{!Get_Calendly_Action.Calendly__EventStartTime__c}


Lecturer:

{!Get_Calendly_Action.Calendly__EventPrimaryPublisherName__c}

fields.name: displayCorrectEventAlert
fields.fieldText:
You've marked that this is the correct event.

The Event will be linked to the Campaign.

fields.name: displayIncorrectEventAlert
fields.fieldText:
If this event is correct, please confirm it, by selecting "Correct".


If you proceed from this screen now, we will try to find the correct event again.

fields.name: headerNoInviteeUuidDetected
fields.fieldText:
No Unique Calendly Booking ID Exists


This Campaign is not directly linked to a specific Calendly Booking.


You can still send emails to Host and attendees and reschedule the Campaign, but no information will automatically be given to the Lecturer and no event will be updated in their Calendar.

fields.name: headerScreen1
fields.fieldText: Reschedule Lecture

fields.name: displayNoAttendeesNoEmail
fields.fieldText: Since there are no bookings for this event, we will not send any emails

value.stringValue: Email to Attendees is sent from
Email to Host is sent from

fields.name: headerScreen2
fields.fieldText: Successfully Rescheduled Campaign

fields.name: displayInfo
fields.fieldText: Go to the new Campaign

fields.name: displayWaitForCalendlyAction
fields.fieldText:
Awaiting Server


Your Cancellation is being processed, please wait a few seconds...

subflows.name: AL_Send_List_Email_from_Input_Campaign
subflows.label: AL - Send List Email from Input Campaign

textTemplates.name: DK_Attendee_Body
textTemplates.text:
Kre {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},


Vi vil informere dig om, at tidspunktet/datoen for foredraget hos {!Get_Campaign.Host__r.Name} er blevet ndret fra {!Get_Campaign.Start__c} til {!NewStartTime}.


Tak for din forstelse vi glder os til at se dig!


Med venlig hilsen

Din Familiejurist

textTemplates.name: DK_Host_Body
textTemplates.text:
Kre {!Get_Campaign.Contact__r.FirstName},


Vi bekrfter hermed, at tidspunktet/datoen for foredraget hos {!Get_Campaign.Host__r.Name} er blevet ndret fra {!Get_Campaign.Start__c} til {!NewStartTime}.


Tusind tak for jeres fleksibilitet vi glder os til at afholde foredraget hos jer p det nye tidspunkt.


Med venlig hilsen

Din Familiejurist

textTemplates.name: ptMultipleReschedulesError
textTemplates.text: This Campaign has already been rescheduled once and cannot be rescheduled via the system once more. To reschedule this Campaign again, please reach out to your system administrator to perform a manual rescheduling.

textTemplates.name: SE_Attendee_Body
textTemplates.text:
Hej {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},


Vi vill meddela att datumet/tidpunkten fr frelsningen hos {!Get_Campaign.Host__r.Name} har ndrats frn {!Get_Campaign.Start__c} till {!NewStartTime}.


Tack fr din frstelse vi ser fram emot att trffa dig!


Vnliga hlsningar

Din Familjejurist

textTemplates.name: SE_Host_Body
textTemplates.text:
Hej {!Get_Campaign.Contact__r.FirstName},


Vi bekrftar hrmed att datumet/tidpunkten fr frelsningen hos {!Get_Campaign.Host__r.Name} har ndrats frn {!Get_Campaign.Start__c} till {!NewStartTime}.


Stort tack fr er flexibilitet vi ser fram emot att hlla frelsningen hos er p den nya tiden.


Vnliga hlsningar

Din Familiejurist
